name: vtocle
params: setvar s0, class c0, wff w0

body.origin:
|- w0
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wi(wcel(c0, universe), w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- w0
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wi(wcel(c0, universe), w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, universe), w0)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w0)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- w0
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w0)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

comment: Implicit substitution of a class for a setvar variable. (Contributed by NM, 9-Sep-1993.)
